alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hillsborough County through 500 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fish Hawk, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Brandon, Fish Hawk, Riverview, Palm River-Clair Mel, East Lake-Orient Park, Valrico, Alafia River State Park, Seffner, Gibsonton, Florida State Fairgrounds, Mango, Palm River, Dover, Tampa Executive Airport, Boyette, Progress Village and Orient Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
